name: LaTeX CV Environment
description: Environment setup for building PDF CV from LaTeX source using lualatex

tools.name: lualatex
tools.installCommand: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y texlive-full

tools.name: latexmk
tools.installCommand: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y texlive-full

tools.name: make
tools.description: Build automation tool for running Makefile
tools.installCommand: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y build-essential

commands.name: Install TeX Live Full
commands.description: Install complete TeX Live distribution with lualatex support

commands.name: Verify lualatex installation
commands.description: Verify that lualatex is available in PATH

commands.name: Build CV PDF
commands.description: Build the CV PDF using the provided Makefile

commands.name: Verify CV builds successfully
commands.description: Clean build the CV to ensure all dependencies are working

notes: This environment uses texlive-full which provides comprehensive LaTeX support including lualatex
The CV uses a custom document class (my-resume.cls) and includes image files
Build output is CV_PeetCremer_en.pdf generated from CV_PeetCremer_en.tex
The Makefile uses lualatex with specific options for proper compilation
Installation size is approximately 4-6GB for texlive-full package
